The Prime Minster went on to praise the manner in which Andy Coulson ran the Number 10 communication's team, saying it worked in a very proper and transparent and decent way; that hasn't always been the case in the past. Andy Coulson has been the centre of endless speculation in recent months over how much he knew about phone-hacking while he was editing the News of The World and how widespread it was.

Mike Davis, senior analyst at Ovum, said the company was awarding Eric Schmidt the payout for taking Google from a garage start-up into a multi-billion profit company during his ten-year tenure. The share cash-in could be due to Eric Schmidt knowing something we don't, but he is probably just looking for a really good retirement, added Mike Davis. Under the leadership of Eric Schmidt , Google has branched into several new markets such as mobile devices with its Android operating system and the enterprise market with Google Apps. may be returning to its start-up roots. "A lot of the growth of the company used to be driven by innovation," said Yun Kim, an analyst at investment firm Gleacher& Co. Having someone with the very strong products background that Larry has could bring some innovation back to Google Inc. . Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain as executive chairman and will advise Page and Sergey Brin , Google Inc. 's other co-founder. Sergey Brin will give up his title as co-president to work on high-priority projects.

I have forgiven Michael Vick . From this day forward, I will no longer bash Michael Vick on my Facebook page or in this column. There will be no more references to "scum" or a piece of trash who shouldn't be given the privilege of playing quarterback in the NFL. Seriously, I am trying to learn the true meaning of the word "forgiveness" and sometimes that means letting things go. This does not mean I condone his felonious acts of animal cruelty
